concept.title: Starter switch
concept.shortdesc: The starter switch works when the ignition is on to fire up the engine ready for driving.

conbody.p: The starter switch is the circular black knob on the floor in front of the driver's seat.

ul.li: Push the knob down quickly and firmly with your thumb or forefinger to operate the starter.
Release it as soon as the engine fires.
